wikipedia_page.main: Robin Chalk (born 1981) is an English actor in film and theatre. His work includes the West End production of Dirty Dancing and the science-fiction film Moon directed by Duncan Jones. He appeared in the film Alleycats directed by Ian Bonhote and the computer games Until Dawn and Need for Speed: Payback.

response: Robin Chalk appears as Rockwell's body double in portraying the Sam Bell clones.
